posts.name: Murilo Miranda Santos
posts.cooked: Good morning! My FRC team is having trouble connecting their pistons using pneumatic components. Can anyone assist? Sorry for my English; I’m Brazilian and not very fluent.

posts.name: Josh
posts.cooked:
Do you mean putting the air hose stuff together or actually connecting/mounting them to your robot?

Mounting typically involves using bolts or a plate.

Connecting the hoses requires seeing a picture similar to this one.

posts.name: Mert Ata BABER
posts.cooked: This is a link to https://www.frczero.org/pneumatics/pneumatic-systems/. The document titled "Pneumatics-StepByStep-roboRIO.pdf" is available, and its file size is 1223.18 KB.
